description:
During the freshmen orientation, Ito Makoto met Katsura Kotonoha and immediately developed a crush on her.  They would ride on the same train together every morning, and all Makoto could do was make himself look busy by looking at the standby screen on his cell phone.  Thinking that love charms and the like would just be a waste, Makoto`s luck turns around as his classmate Saionji Sekai, notices what`s on his standby screen and decides to help him out...
Source: crunchyroll
